From coast to coast, we are building a better future.

This year, 20,000 infrastructure projects will be underway that will transform communities, create good-paying jobs, and rebuild our nation's infrastructure. https://t.co/tfgXTMfUpM
Since President @JoeBiden and I took office, over 12.5 million new jobs have been created, including 800,000 manufacturing jobs.

When President Biden and I took office, we vowed to rebuild America’s manufacturing sector, bring jobs back from overseas, strengthen our supply chains, and build in America.

And we have kept that promise by investing hundreds of billions of dollars in American manufacturing. https://t.co/CThOLGh51F

12.7 million jobs have been created since we took office
253,000 jobs were added last month
The unemployment rate fell to 3.4%

While we have more work to do, we are building our economy from the bottom up and the middle out. https://t.co/CCEQe14z9h

Created over 12 million jobs.
Capped insulin at $35/month for seniors.
Passed the largest climate investment ever.
Made historic infrastructure investments.
Protected marriage equality in federal law.

We've made progress, but there’s still much more to do.

Let’s finish the job. https://t.co/8rbwS58A8y

For two years, President @JoeBiden and I have fought to uphold and protect the fundamental freedoms of the American people. 

We have stood together defending freedom and democracy, civil rights, human rights, and women's rights. 

And now, we need to finish the job. https://t.co/ke17WfxMLv
When we invest in small businesses, we invest in jobs, opportunity, innovation, and in America.

217 House Republicans voted for a bill that could cut up to 60,000 teaching jobs—affecting more than 25 million kids. 

Our teachers and children deserve better. https://t.co/ktQ3RGIOKQ

Record job growth.
Largest investment in climate action in history.
Manufacturing is growing faster than it has in decades.
Greatest two years of small business creation on record.

President @JoeBiden and I are delivering for working families, and we're just getting started. https://t.co/OqIZjrIkSK

We have created more than 12.7 million new jobs. 

That’s more jobs created in the two years that we’ve been in office than any presidency has created in four.

This Teacher Appreciation Week and every week, I’m thankful for America’s teachers. But they deserve more than thanks.

Teachers go above and beyond their job for their students every day—they deserve higher wages and better working conditions.
With unemployment now down to 3.4% and 253,000 jobs created in April, it's clear our economic agenda has powered a historic economic recovery.

In 2020, voters sent @JoeBiden and me to the White House. 

In 2022, we were able to help defend reproductive rights on state ballots from California to Kentucky and win races up and down the ballot. 

In 2024, let’s finish the job.
I'm proud to run for reelection with President @JoeBiden so we can finish the job. https://t.co/x7uN8gbEKG

Created more jobs in two years than any presidency has created in four. 
Unemployment is near its lowest rate in over 50 years. 

Our economic plan is working.

Tonight at 6:45pm ET our team is hosting a virtual strategy call to mobilize supporters nationwide. Join us and help finish the job for the American people: https://t.co/GfaU15NS7A. https://t.co/b9s07aemcT

We’ve helped create over 12 million jobs, lowered prescription drug costs, and taken the largest action to fight climate change in American history.

Now it’s time to build on our progress and finish the job. That’s why @JoeBiden and I are running for reelection.

President @JoeBiden and I have a bold agenda, but we need to finish the job. 

We want to make our economy work for families like yours: those who are the backbone of this country. 

That’s why we’re running for reelection. https://t.co/KwQ0yGAoFx

More than 12 million new jobs. Historic action to tackle the climate crisis. Lower health care and prescription drug costs. 

We have made so much progress in our first two years, but there’s still so much more to do. 

Let’s finish the job.
https://t.co/fhnt1zhzJm

Since President Biden and I were sworn in: 

—Over 12 million new jobs, including good-paying union jobs 
—Unemployment is near its lowest rate 
—American manufacturing is growing faster than it has in decades
Since taking office, President Biden and I have helped create more than 12 million good-paying jobs—and American manufacturing is growing faster than it has in decades. https://t.co/cSVwYKT6rC
When we invest in climate, clean energy, and U.S.-based manufacturing, we invest in American jobs.

Created over 12 million new jobs
Launched more than 20,000 infrastructure projects nationwide 
Strengthened American manufacturing 

We are getting the work done for the American people. https://t.co/R9E7znJ0LW

The Inflation Reduction Act is the largest investment in history to combat the climate crisis.

That means cleaner air and water and millions of new good-paying jobs as we build a clean energy economy that works for all Americans.

With your support, we helped create 12.4 million jobs, made historic infrastructure investments, and protected marriage equality in federal law.

To build on our progress, we need to elect more Democrats nationwide in 2023. Can you chip in to the DNC now? https://t.co/5ldcLKosLH

The budget proposal President Biden put forward funds research, clean energy, and career training as we work to create good-paying jobs that don't require a four-year degree.

It’s an investment in American workers.

Our economy added 311,000 jobs last month. 

Since President @JoeBiden and I took office, we’ve created 12.4 million new jobs—the strongest two years of job growth on record.

The American Rescue Plan resulted in Americans getting back to work, more small businesses started in the last two years than in any two-year period in history, and cutting the child poverty rate in half. 

Now, we must build on that momentum and finish the job.

Two years ago today, President Biden signed the American Rescue Plan into law. 

It has helped working families and helped get our economy on the right track—having created more jobs in two years than any presidency has created in four. https://t.co/rutRGFbcoy
We’re bringing down costs for the American people but the job is not done. https://t.co/BaopbaRWsy

By the end of the year, more than 20,000 projects will be underway to transform communities, create good-paying jobs, and build a better future.

We have the momentum. 

Created 12 million new jobs. 
Capped insulin at $35 a month for seniors. 
Passed the largest climate investment ever.
Made historic infrastructure investments.
Protected marriage equality in federal law.

Let’s finish the job. https://t.co/PXa1PBQlBf

President @JoeBiden and I took office during the worst economic crisis in a generation. 

While there’s still more work to do, two years later, our economic plan is working with 12M new jobs created, 10.5M total new businesses created, and the lowest unemployment in 54 years.

We’re dedicated to building a clean energy future and delivering environmental justice for everyone, everywhere. 

That means helping create millions of jobs and working to achieve clean air and water for all. https://t.co/tBzfuzS7t7
From 12 million jobs created to lowering costs for families, President @JoeBiden and I are delivering results for the American people. https://t.co/faKUdFFrT1

12 million jobs have been created since we took office, 517,000 jobs were added last month, and the unemployment rate is at its lowest in 54 years. President @JoeBiden’s economic plan to rebuild an economy from the bottom up and middle out is working.

When it comes to the climate crisis, we don’t have time to waste. 

That’s why we passed the most significant investment ever to tackle climate change, which will lower utility bills, help create jobs, and lead us into a clean energy future.

As President @JoeBiden said, the state of our union is strong. 

Over the last two years, we've made significant progress toward building a future in which everyone can thrive. 

Now, it's time to finish the job. https://t.co/TXVj8w021d

In the last 24 months, the economy has created 12 million jobs in America, and more people are working than at any point in American history. 

While there’s still more work to do, we’re making immense progress.

The latest jobs report: 

—More than half a million jobs created last month
—12 million jobs have been added since we took office 
—Lowest unemployment rate in 54 years

Our economic plan is working.

I had the type of job where I could take time to be with my mother when she was diagnosed with cancer. 

Every worker should be able to take time off to care for the people they love. Together, we will work towards ensuring paid family and medical leave for every worker. https://t.co/00VxzVSRwK

America is seeing record job growth. 

When we lead, we build a future in which every American not only survives, but can thrive. https://t.co/vmnJ8VP6IO
Since President @JoeBiden and I took office, the economy has added a record 12 million jobs—that's more jobs in two years than under any president in a full four-year term.

The Inflation Reduction Act’s climate investments will lead the nation into a new clean energy economy by helping generate millions of jobs—including jobs that don’t require a four-year degree—and advancing environmental justice in communities across the country.

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law's once-in-a-generation investments, we are implementing our plan to remove lead pipes, make high-speed internet accessible and affordable, and create more good-paying jobs.

10.5 million jobs have been created since we took office, 263,000 jobs were added last month, and the unemployment rate remains near historic lows. While we have more work to do, we are hard at work rebuilding our economy from the bottom up and the middle out.

When small business owners have the support they need, they create jobs, drive, innovation, and grow our economy. On Small Business Saturday and throughout the holidays, be sure to shop local and support the backbone of our communities. https://t.co/OLLGRmo4U2

—10 million jobs created 
—The unemployment rate is at a near match of a 50-year low

We’re making historic progress for workers, small businesses, and our economy.

The CHIPS and Science Act will lower the costs of everything from cars to dishwashers, create good-paying manufacturing jobs, and help ensure the United States manufactures more critical technologies here at home.

President @JoeBiden is leading a manufacturing boom.

We know what Democrats stand for: working people, good jobs at fair wages, decency, and democracy. 

All of these issues are on the ballot. Make a plan to vote at https://t.co/VbrfuqVy9P. https://t.co/42p4tgvXL7

Democrats stand for the middle class. 

We stand for working families and for equality and equity for every American. 

We fight for good jobs. 

We fight for affordable health care and opportunity for all. 

When Democrats are in charge, we deliver.

Every single Republican in Congress voted against the Inflation Reduction Act. It will: 
 
—Lower prescription drug prices.
—Lower health care costs.
—Lower energy costs.
—Tackle the climate crisis.
—Create good-paying jobs.
—Create a fairer tax system.

The CHIPS and Science Act will create good-paying union jobs and grow the workforce in a way that benefits all of society.

President Biden and I are determined to lead the most pro-union administration in America’s history.

Senators are attempting to pass a national abortion ban and criminalize doctors for simply doing the job they were trained to do: Deliver health care. 

There’s a clear disconnect with the priorities of everyday Americans.

We have recovered all jobs lost in the pandemic. Schools are back open. Small businesses are growing. Because we are growing our economy the nation’s unemployment rate matches the lowest it’s been in 50 years. 

That’s progress.

We're seeing the impact of climate change around our nation.

If we don't act now, it will be irreversible. 

The Inflation Reduction Act takes aggressive action on climate change while creating good-paying jobs in communities across our country.

The latest jobs report:

—Over half a million jobs were added last month
—Over 9 million jobs have been added since taking office
—Matched the lowest unemployment rate in half a century

There’s still more work to do, but we are making significant progress.
Thanks to President @JoeBiden’s leadership, the Inflation Reduction Act will lower health care costs, lower energy costs, fight the climate crisis, and create good-paying jobs.

Our economy created over half a million jobs last month and over 9 million jobs in the previous 18 months—meaning that we have recovered all the jobs lost during the pandemic. 

While there's more work to do, we're delivering for the American people.

President @JoeBiden just signed the Inflation Reduction Act into law. 

It will lower the cost of prescription drugs, reduce the deficit, address the climate crisis, and create jobs—and it’s paid for by making large corporations pay their fair share in taxes. https://t.co/KyFhR9e6yj

The Inflation Reduction Act would lower health insurance costs by an average of $800 yearly for 13 million Americans.

It would also reduce the cost of prescription drugs, reduce the deficit, address the climate crisis, and create jobs.

Let's send it to President Biden's desk.

Thanks to the American Rescue Plan, we are creating good-paying jobs for nurses, doctors, steel workers, pipe fitters, and engineers.

Together, we are investing in training programs and apprenticeships that give workers the skills to take on jobs with better wages and benefits.

Every worker deserves: 

—A safe and healthy workplace 
—A job with good wages and fair benefits 
—The choice to join a union 

We will do everything to ensure our nation's workers can succeed and thrive because when workers succeed, so does our country.

President Biden and I were sworn into office when our nation was facing a pandemic out of control and an economy in freefall.

But we were not deterred.

Now, we‘ve seen record job creation, record decline in unemployment, and a record increase in labor participation.

The latest jobs report:

390,000 jobs were added last month. 
Nearly 9 million new jobs have been added since taking office.
Historic rates of small business creation.

There’s still more work to do, but we are seeing a shift from recovery to sustainable growth.

Since President Biden and I took office, our country has seen record job creation, declines in unemployment, and an increase in labor participation. 

Challenges remain, but we are headed in the right direction towards steady and stable economic growth.

Since January of last year, the economy has added more than 8 million jobs. Businesses have reopened their doors. Schools are back in person. And, while there is more work to be done, we have made real progress in getting our economy back on track.

While there is still more work to be done, last year, America saw record job creation, economic growth, and small business growth—it was a year of progress and recovery.

We are building a foundation for an economy that can bring everyone along.

Over the last year, we've seen the most significant year of job growth in history and the fastest economic growth in nearly 40 years.

Our work continues to help ease longer-term inflationary pressures and lower costs for working families.

The Community Advantage program has helped launch businesses, create jobs, and drive innovation across our nation. 

We are extending the program until 2024—expanding the number of lenders in the program and increasing the amount of money they can lend.
Here’s the bottom line: When small business owners have the support they need, they create jobs, drive and inspire innovation, and grow our entire economy.

Over the past year, we have taken significant action to address the gender wage gap.

We passed the American Rescue Plan, which provided immediate relief to millions of women, and the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law that created good-paying jobs for many women in the workforce. https://t.co/VCmHZb2aF9

One year ago today, President Biden signed the American Rescue Plan into law. 

It helped deliver 500 million shots in arms, the biggest single year of job growth in history, and the largest one-year drop in unemployment on record.

Through the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, historic investments are being made to our infrastructure and supply chains to prevent bottlenecks and lower daily expenses. 

We are working towards lowering costs for families while creating good-paying jobs.

Our economy created over 6.5 million new jobs last year—more jobs created in one year than ever before in the history of America. 

We are building a better America.

We’re not just getting rid of lead pipes. We’re creating jobs.

Through the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, we will invest in job training, upgrade our workforce's skills, partner with our labor unions, and establish apprenticeships—all to create jobs replacing lead pipes.

The Executive Order on Project Labor Agreements will ensure federal construction projects are built on time—improving construction work around the country and job quality for nearly 200,000 workers.

We’re fulfilling our promise to build a more skilled and productive workforce.

Americans are back at work at a record-setting pace. Our economy created 467,000 jobs in January, and 6.6 million jobs have been created since we took office.

While there’s more work to be done, we are focused on rebuilding an economy that will lift up all Americans.

The latest jobs report shows America’s economy created 6.6 million jobs within the last year, exceeding expectations. 

We are making historic strides to build our country back better than before.

There’s more work to be done, but, so far, our economy has added more than 6 million jobs. 

Together, we are helping Americans get back to work.

We still have a lot of work ahead of us, but we are focused on getting Americans back to work and rebuilding the middle class.

The economy has added more than 6 million jobs this past year, and the unemployment rate dropped to 3.9%.

Getting rid of lead pipes in our communities is about public health. It’s about keeping our kids safe in schools. It’s about strengthening apprenticeship programs and creating jobs. 

We’re working to strengthen our infrastructure and replace lead pipes across the country.

Last year was the greatest year of job growth in American history. 

Our economic plan is creating good jobs for Americans, rebuilding our manufacturing, and helping make our companies more competitive.

We have a lot of work ahead of us, but this past year, America saw the fastest economic growth since 1984, with a record number of jobs added to the economy and a record drop in the unemployment rate. 

America is on the move.

From adding 6 million new jobs to the unemployment rate dropping to 3.9%, last year was a year of enormous progress.

We’re getting America’s economy back on track.

In our first year in office:

—More than 6 million jobs created 
—The unemployment rate is down to 3.9%
—Unemployment claims are at their lowest level since 1969

We’re making historic progress for workers, small businesses, and our economy—and it’s only just the beginning.

This past year, America has seen record job creation, economic growth, and small business creation. 

We’re rebuilding our economy to lift up all Americans.

Since President Biden and I took office, we have gotten shots in arms, got people back to work, and passed laws that will rebuild our crumbling infrastructure while creating good-paying jobs.

We are delivering on our promises for America’s working families.

Today’s jobs report: 

—Added 6.4 million jobs since January of last year 
—Lowest unemployment rate since the beginning of the pandemic
—Regained 84% of jobs lost in the pandemic 

Today is a historic day of our economic recovery as Americans are getting back to work.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law will soon fix our roads and bridges, replace lead pipes, and connect families in urban and rural areas with accessible high-speed internet—and we will do all of this while creating good-paying jobs.

Our economy is growing faster than it has in decades. Unemployment is down to 4.2%, and nearly 6 million jobs have been added since January.

We must make sure that everyone shares in this growth by lowering costs for families and removing barriers to success in all communities.
Every American deserves access to clean drinking water. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law will help make that a reality by creating jobs that will start to replace lead pipes across the country.

No parent should have to sit outside a fast-food restaurant so their child can do their homework online. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law will create good-paying jobs that will help connect every American to affordable, high-speed internet.

Nearly 6 million million new jobs since President @JoeBiden and I took office. 

While there’s more work to be done, we are making tremendous strides to build our country back better than before.

I visited Charlotte, North Carolina to talk about the investments we’re making in public transit and jobs.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law will help people get to where they need to go.

President @JoeBiden is working to address high gas prices and lower the costs Americans face at the pump. 

In the long run, we will reduce our dependence on oil and create good-paying jobs by transitioning to a clean energy economy. That’s why we must pass Build Back Better.

Our administration has seen 5.6 million jobs created by the economy—more jobs in our first nine months than any other administration in American history. 
https://t.co/ZQ3SVFnlzO

As President Biden says, America’s small businesses are the primary job creators, innovators, and drivers that power our nation’s economic progress. On Small Business Saturday and throughout the holidays, be sure to shop local and support the backbone of our communities.

Under the Biden-Harris administration, America has seen record job creation, economic growth, and small business creation. 

We’re rebuilding our economy to lift up all Americans.
The Infrastructure Investment And Jobs Act proves that, in America, we have the courage to believe a better future is possible—and to build it together.

Together, the Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal and Build Back Better Act will create good-paying jobs, rebuild our crumbling infrastructure, lower costs for working families, and make historic investments in our future.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal is a once-in-a-generation investment in America’s infrastructure. It will deliver: 

— Repaired roads and bridges 
— Clean water
— High speed internet
— Stronger supply chains
— A more resilient electrical grid
— Good-paying jobs

President @JoeBiden just signed the Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal into law. 

It will create good-paying jobs, strengthen our supply chains, and invest in modernizing everything from our bridges and roads to our electrical grid.

While our economy has added 5.6 million jobs this year, people across the country are seeing higher prices on everything from gas to groceries.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal and Build Back Better Act will help lower costs for working families.
The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will create good-paying, union jobs in transforming America’s infrastructure. https://t.co/T0Ir1ss4nb
President @JoeBiden’s Build Back Better Framework will create millions of good-paying jobs, ensuring that American workers, businesses, and farmers can compete and win in the 21st century.

By investing in the clean energy economy, we can create good-paying jobs, help families cut down on their home energy bills, and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. That’s what the Build Back Better Framework does.

More than 193 million Americans are now fully vaccinated, children 5 and up are eligible to receive the vaccine, and the economy added more than half a million jobs in October. 

We are accelerating the path out of this pandemic.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will create millions of good jobs across the country. Jobs in red states, blue states, rural communities, small towns, and big cities. 

This is an investment in all of America. 
https://t.co/0J5g9bMB6N

The U.S. has added 5.6 million jobs since President @JoeBiden took office. 

This recovery was sparked by the American Rescue Plan putting money directly in the hands of working families and launching one of the fastest mass vaccination campaigns ever.

Our Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will lower costs for working families, modernize our ports, reduce supply chain bottlenecks, and ease inflationary pressures on the economy while creating millions of good jobs. 

America is getting back to work.

This year, our economy has created 5.6 million jobs, unemployment is below 5%, we have a Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal to rebuild our nation’s infrastructure, and the Build Back Better Framework is on the way. 

President @JoeBiden is delivering for the American people.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will create millions of good jobs, help build our clean energy economy, and deliver clean water and high-speed broadband to communities across the country. 

It’s a win for all Americans. https://t.co/miCMEmbGNj
Our economy created 531,000 jobs last month, exceeding expectations. We are making tremendous strides to build our country back better than before. https://t.co/VUp6Hxs5ex
The Build Back Better Framework will be a transformative investment in climate, care, and kids that will lower costs for families, create good-paying jobs, and grow the economy.
The Biden-Harris administration has created more jobs in our first eight months than any other administration in American history.

Virginia, @TerryMcAuliffe is running for governor to build a strong economy that creates good-paying jobs and invests in education and workers, and to protect the progress we’ve made.

Let’s elect Terry and Democrats up and down the ballot. https://t.co/FoYtjhIi5R
Our Build Back Better Agenda will cut taxes for the middle class, lower costs for working families, create jobs, and sustain economic growth for years to come.

If big corporations and the very wealthy pay their fair share, we can invest in the American people, cut taxes for the middle class, reduce health care costs, create jobs, fight climate change, and so much more. https://t.co/4U1XeNqe2V
Our Build Back Better Agenda will lower costs for middle-class families and create millions of good-paying jobs rebuilding our country's infrastructure.

Campaigning with Gov. @GavinNewsom today—a leader who has guided California through unprecedented crises and is a key partner to building our economy back better than before. Let’s keep him on the job.
https://t.co/YE6jJB6W5k
The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will generate millions of jobs, modernize our transportation infrastructure, and create a more sustainable future for our children.

To date, we’ve created more jobs than any other administration has in its first six months. While there’s more work to be done, we are making tremendous strides to build our country back better than before. https://t.co/i6Yp7xlSY6

Virginia Democrats are fired up and ready to continue creating good-paying jobs and ensure every child has a world-class education. Tune in for a grassroots event with @JoeBiden and @TerryMcAuliffe. 

https://t.co/ba7pmRZIqr
We believe tackling climate change, improving communities, and creating jobs can occur simultaneously. We can do this and more with the Build Back Better Agenda.

The American Jobs Plan will put Americans to work fixing the roads you drive on every day, getting rid of the lead pipes that harm our children, and expanding broadband so every American has access to affordable high-speed internet.

More than one-third of people who live in rural America lack access to reliable high-speed broadband.

The American Jobs Plan will bring affordable, reliable, high-speed broadband to every American—all while creating good-paying jobs.

Good transit equals vibrant communities.  

The American Jobs Plan is not just an investment in millions of jobs rebuilding the infrastructure of our country. It’s an investment in improving communities. It’s an investment in increasing access to opportunity.
The American Jobs Plan is about building up America’s workforce. https://t.co/s7pQ740FQB

Thanks to President @JoeBiden’s leadership, help is here. Watch as he speaks live from Pittsburgh about the investments we need to make in our country—and the good-paying, union jobs of the future that we can create.

“We will finish the job of getting a total of $2,000 in cash relief to people who need it the most.

The $600 already appropriated is simply not enough.” 
—Your next president, @JoeBiden

My mother taught me that no matter how you earn a living, whether you’re a caregiver or truck driver, grocery store clerk or small business owner, every job has inherent value and worth. https://t.co/qjUkMvtquA

The Georgia runoffs are about health care, about jobs, about justice. This will not be easy but it is within our power to change the course of our nation’s history by electing @ReverendWarnock and @Ossoff. https://t.co/TjYeiD5T6a

The Biden-Harris administration has one of the most ambitious climate plans in history:

✓Secure carbon-pollution free electricity by 2035. 
✓Achieve net-zero emissions no later than 2050.
✓Invest in a clean energy future, and create millions of good-paying jobs.

With @PeteButtigieg’s leadership, we are ready to write the next great chapter in our nation’s history, modernizing our infrastructure, creating jobs and opportunity, and helping usher in a clean energy future. https://t.co/BFiEJMfKfJ

To build back better we need to usher in a sustainable transportation system that helps us connect all Americans to jobs and opportunity. @PeteButtigieg will do that as Transportation Secretary. https://t.co/SqHBwIrOhV

We need to build a new American economy that works for everyone. Tune in now as @JoeBiden addresses the final jobs report of 2020 and how we will get through this economic crisis together. https://t.co/YyIeg6L5lP

On the campaign trail, Joe and I met essential workers who’ve stayed on the job as they worry about their family’s safety. 

We met small business owners who’ve dipped into their own savings to make payroll. 

Their stories have stayed with us. We'll build back better for them.

Future generations deserve clear air, safe rivers, and a livable planet that we can pass down.

@JoeBiden and I will listen to the scientists, transform our energy sector, and create millions of jobs in the process.

If you already voted, your job’s not finished yet: with only 10 days until Election Day, we need your help talking to voters in critical battleground states and reminding them to cast their ballots. Sign up to make calls today: https://t.co/5GJfTjAUrl

Young people graduating from college are wondering if they can get a job. People are worried about whether they’ll be able to make rent. This is where the American economy is right now, and it’s because of the failure of leadership of this administration.

Because of Justice Ginsburg, people could get the job of their dreams, earn equal pay for their work, marry the person they love, and enjoy the full rights and privileges of citizenship that they deserve—free of discrimination.
 
Her legacy is at stake.

Parents are praying for their children’s safety at school.
Essential workers are risking everything to do their jobs.
Small businesses are struggling to keep the doors open. 
200,000 Americans have died.

It didn’t have to be this way. We just needed a competent president.

A Biden-Harris administration will create millions of good-paying, union jobs and ensure the future is made in America — by all of America. Tune in as @JoeBiden speaks in Hermantown, MN on how we’ll get it done. https://t.co/D3XkkfrJk1
.@JoeBiden is right. We must build a future that not only offers good-paying jobs, but protections and dignity for all workers.

Tomorrow on the 57th anniversary of the historic March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom, I'm virtually joining @TheRevAl, @NationalAction, and @OfficialMLK3 for #MOW2020. Tune in starting at 11am ET and continue the ongoing fight for justice: https://t.co/mrhlnqm9vD https://t.co/jsPayQvY43

Let's be real clear: Donald Trump failed to take coronavirus seriously from the start. His lack of leadership cost millions of Americans their jobs and led to more than 110,000 small businesses closing for good. 

Americans deserve a real leader to fix this—and that’s @JoeBiden.
.@JoeBiden will bring us together to build an economy that doesn’t leave anyone behind—where a good-paying job is the floor, not the ceiling. https://t.co/qPKbunAeYg

.@MichelleObama speaking truth to power. Donald Trump is not up for the job—but @JoeBiden is. 
https://t.co/UDCCofB0Rv

As @JoeBiden always points out, this election is about more than politics. It’s about who we are as a country. It’s about the soul of our nation. Together we’ll create millions of jobs, fight the climate crisis, pass the John Lewis Voting Rights Act, and more.
